description: tarot cards and basic information about them, as well as references to corresponding scans

cards.name: The Fool
cards.fortune_telling: Take a leap of faith! Choose someone at the party and convince them to join you in a spontaneous dance-off. Loser takes a sip!

cards.name: The Magician
cards.fortune_telling: Embrace your inner magician. Perform a magic trick for the group. If they're not amazed, take three sips.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.fortune_telling: Channel your mysterious side. Share an interesting secret with the group. If they can't guess whether it's true or false, they drink.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.fortune_telling: Embrace luxury! Compliment someone's outfit extravagantly. If they blush, they take a sip; if not, you take one.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.fortune_telling: Assume authority! Give someone at the party an order, and if they follow it, they're safe. If not, they drink.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.fortune_telling: Confess your silliest misdeed to the group. If they forgive you, you're safe; if not, it's time for a sip.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.fortune_telling: Celebrate new connections! Take a shot with someone you've never spoken to before. Cheers to unexpected friendships!

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.fortune_telling: Claim victory on the dance floor! Challenge someone to a dance battle. The winner gets to assign a sip to the loser.

cards.name: Strength
cards.fortune_telling: Show your inner strength! Flex your muscles for everyone. The first person to mimic your flex accurately is safe; others take a sip.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.fortune_telling: Embrace solitude! Take a moment alone to come up with an impromptu poem. Share it with the group, and if they applaud, you're safe; if not, drink up.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.fortune_telling: Leave it to fate! Let someone else at the party make a decision for you. If it turns out well, they're safe; if not, they drink.

cards.name: Justice
cards.fortune_telling: Hold a mini court session! Choose two people to state their cases for a silly dispute. The group votes, and the 'guilty' party takes a sip.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.fortune_telling: Reveal a hidden talent! Whether it's juggling or singing, perform for the group. If they applaud, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Death
cards.fortune_telling: Embrace change! Swap drinks with someone else at the party. If you both like the new drink, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.fortune_telling: Find balance! Walk a straight line (real or imaginary) with a drink in hand. If you succeed, choose someone else to take a sip; if not, it's your turn.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.fortune_telling: Confront temptation! Choose a partner for a quick game of rock-paper-scissors. The loser takes a sip, and the winner revels in resisting the 'devilish' temptation.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.fortune_telling: Build and destroy! Use building blocks or cards to create a tower. Knock it down, and everyone takes a sip. If it stands, you're safe.

cards.name: The Star
cards.fortune_telling: Embrace your celestial side! Share your zodiac sign and a fun fact about it. If someone else knows a fact about your sign, they're safe; if not, they drink.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.fortune_telling: Howl at the moon! Choose a friend to join you in a howling competition. The most enthusiastic howler is safe; the others take a sip.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.fortune_telling: Bask in the sunlight! Share the happiest moment of your week. If it brings smiles, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.fortune_telling: Face the past! Share a funny or embarrassing story from your past. If the group laughs with you, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: The World
cards.fortune_telling: Celebrate achievements! Share a recent accomplishment, and everyone raises their glasses for a toast. Cheers to your success!

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Dive into romance! Propose a toast to love and take a sip. If someone else proposes a toast, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Spill the tea! Share a secret crush or a funny dating story. If it gets laughs or awws, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Unleash your unconventional side! Perform a quirky dance move for the group. If it gets applause, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Satisfy a restless lover! Offer to refill someone's drink. If they decline, they drink; if not, you're safe.

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Face the music! Share a breakup story or a failed endeavor. If the group sympathizes, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Share the joy! Give someone a compliment, and if they return the favor, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Cut through illusions! Challenge someone to a quick game of charades. If they guess your word, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Move on from the past! Encourage someone to join you in a symbolic gesture of leaving something behind. If they agree, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Make a wish! Share a personal desire or goal. If the group supports it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Build family bonds! Propose a group activity that fosters togetherness. If they agree, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Embrace the watery vibe! Share a dreamy or creative idea. If someone else appreciates it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Rally around a cause! Propose a fun and passionate group activity. If they're on board, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Sway with emotion! Express an opinion or idea with deep emotion. If it resonates, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.fortune_telling: Foster fairness and tolerance! Settle a friendly debate or dispute with a fair decision. If they agree, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Make a decisive move! Challenge someone to a quick game of rock-paper-scissors. Winner assigns a sip to the loser.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Refuse to fight! Propose a toast to peace and cooperation. If someone else proposes a toast, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Turn pain into gain! Share a past heartbreak or tough experience. If it inspires empathy, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Postpone decisions! Take a break from the party chaos and meditate for a minute. If you return refreshed, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Guard against betrayal! Choose a partner for a quick trust-building exercise. If you succeed, you're both safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Navigate unexpected consequences! Blindfold someone and guide them through a simple obstacle course. If they succeed, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Question trust! Choose someone to answer three random questions. If their answers seem truthful, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Break free from victimhood! Share a past challenge you've overcome. If the group applauds, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Avoid future regrets! Propose a lighthearted challenge for someone to undertake. If they succeed, you're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Put off plans! Choose someone to postpone a decision or action. If they agree, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Embrace intellectual curiosity! Share a fascinating fact with the group. If it sparks interest, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Avoid blunders! Challenge someone to a quick word association game. If they respond swiftly, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Use clever communication! Describe an everyday object in a creative and entertaining way. If the group appreciates it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.fortune_telling: Exercise sharp decision-making! Settle a playful dispute with a decisive ruling. If they accept it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
fortune_telling: Someone has the 'hots' for you
A new job offer is coming your way
Walk softly, and carry a big stick

cards.name: Two of Wands
fortune_telling: Beware false friends
Don't be mealy-mouthed; say what you think and do what you want to do

cards.name: Three of Wands
fortune_telling: You'll be planning a trip soon
Be on the lookout: your ship is coming in

cards.name: Four of Wands
fortune_telling: Someone is watching and evaluating your work
You may get a wedding invitation soon

cards.name: Five of Wands
fortune_telling: Prepare for a fight with your best friend
Remember: once you let words loose, you can't take them back

cards.name: Six of Wands
fortune_telling: Someone is planning a party for you, but not everyone feels so good about your recent success
Watch out for envious friends

cards.name: Seven of Wands
fortune_telling: Don't be surprised by a personal attack
Prepare to defend yourself or someone you love

cards.name: Eight of Wands
fortune_telling: Watch for a surprising letter in the mail
Your whole world is about to be turned on its ear

cards.name: Nine of Wands
fortune_telling: Don't relax yet; there's more to come
The test you're facing now is happening for one reason: to show you who your real friends are

cards.name: Ten of Wands
fortune_telling: You're worn out
Back off, take a time out, and let someone else handle things for a while

cards.name: Page of Wands
fortune_telling: This card represents a young man or woman with a fiery, enthusiastic demeanor, likely born a Cancer, Leo, or Virgo, who wants to start a new relationship with you

cards.name: Knight of Wands
fortune_telling: This card represents a man with a bold, passionate personality, likely born between July 12th and August 11th, who wants to sweep you off your feet

cards.name: Queen of Wands
fortune_telling: This card represents a woman with an attractive, appealing personality, likely born between March 11th and April 20th, who wants to charm you into doing things her way

cards.name: King of Wands
fortune_telling: This card represents an older man with a commanding, charismatic personality, likely born between November 13th and December 12th, who prefers to give directions and have them followed

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
fortune_telling: Your health will improve
The check you're looking for really is in the mail

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
fortune_telling: It's time to balance the budget
Avoid the temptation to spend critical funds on frivolous goods

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
fortune_telling: A high-dollar contract is in your future
If you work hard, you'll succeed

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
fortune_telling: A rainy day is coming—it's time to save

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
fortune_telling: Finances are getting tighter
Prepare for a setback

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
fortune_telling: When you need help, ask for it
Remember, though: what you receive may be limited by what you've given to others in the past

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
fortune_telling: Things won't work out as expected
Pick up the pieces and prepare to move on

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
fortune_telling: Stop over-analyzing, researching, and outlining
Buckle down and get the work done

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
fortune_telling: Until you appreciate what you have, you won't have any luck getting more

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
fortune_telling: Big money is in the near future
Expect a powerful blessing to come your way

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
fortune_telling: This card represents a young man or woman with an earthy, practical demeanor, likely born an Aries, Taurus, or Gemini, who playfully encourages you to take financial or sexual risks

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
fortune_telling: A stingy person may chide you for spending money
Be prepared to defend an economic or sexual decision

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
fortune_telling: This card represents a woman with an expansive, sensual nature, likely born between December 13th and 31st, who uses sensual appeal and the promise of reward to sway others to her point of view

cards.name: King of Pentacles
fortune_telling: This card represents an older man with a financially, socially, and politically conservative spirit, likely born between August 12th and September 11th, who is known for putting his money where his mouth is
